headline: Does Kroger’s Private Label Expansion Signal Opportunity After 12% Price Jump?
summary: Ever wonder if Kroger is really a bargain or just looks that way after all these years of steady shopping bags and dividends? Let’s get to the bottom of what the current price truly means for investors who care about value. Kroger's stock has been on a bit of a run, climbing 1.8% in the past week and up a solid 8.6% year-to-date, with an impressive 12.4% gain over the last year. Fueling this momentum, Kroger has made headlines with its expansion of private label offerings and investments in...
